LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeDescription & Constraints
Questionnaire-SOTGenericRespiratoryDiseaseCIFGeneric Respiratory Disease Case Investigation FormQuestionnairehttp://worldhealthorganization.github.io/smart-ot/Questionnaire/Questionnaire-SOTGenericRespiratoryDiseaseCIF#0.2.1
investigationFormGeneric Respiratory Disease Case Investigation Form0..1group
basicInformationSection 1: Essential basic Information0..1group
dataCollectorInformationA. Data collector Information0..1group
nameOfDataCollectorName of data collector0..1string
dataCollectorTelephoneNumberData collector telephone number0..1string
dataCollectorInstitutionData collector institution0..1string
formCompletionDateForm completion date (dd/mm/yyyy)0..1date
respondentInformationB. Interview respondent Information (if not patient)0..1group
nameOfRespondentName of respondent0..1string
respondentTelephoneNumberRespondent telephone number0..1string
respondentAddressRespondent address0..1string
relationshipToPatientRelationship to patient0..1string
signsC. Patient identifier Information0..1group
identificationUnique Case ID/cluster number (if applicable)0..1string
caseStatusCase Status0..1choiceValue Set: Case Status
NameName0..1string
countryCountry of residence0..1string
SexSex at birth0..1choiceValue Set: SOT Biological Sex
BirthDateDate of birth (dd/mm/yyyy)0..1date
AgeAge (years,months)0..1string
addressAddress (village/town, district, province/region)0..1string
telephonePatient telephone number0..1string
ClinicalSection 2: Clinical Information0..1group
clinicalCourseD. Patient clinical course0..1group
symptomsSymptom0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
symptomOnsetDatedate of onset of symptoms:____/____/______0..1dateEnable When: symptoms = Yes (YesNoUnknown#Yes)
presentedToHCFHealth facility visit (including traditional care)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
presentedToHCFDateDate of first health facility visit (including traditional care)0..1dateEnable When: presentedToHCF = Yes (YesNoUnknown#Yes)
totalHealthFacilitiesVisitedTotal health facilities visited till outcome0..1integer
dateOfFirstHospitalizationDate of first hospitalization0..1dateValue Set: Yes No Unknown
dateOfICUAdmissionDate of intensive care unit admission0..1dateValue Set: Yes No Unknown
startICUStart: ICU0..1date
stopICUStop: ICU0..1date
dateOfMechanicalVentilationDate of mechanical ventilation0..1dateValue Set: Yes No Unknown
startVentilationStart: Mechanical Ventilation0..1date
stopVentilationStop: Mechanical Ventilation0..1date
dateOfAntiviralTreatmentAntiviral Treatment0..1dateValue Set: Yes No Unknown
startVentilationStart: Antiviral Treatment0..1date
stopVentilationStop: Antiviral Treatment0..1date
outcomeOutcome0..1choiceValue Set: Patient Clinical Course Outcome
outcomeDateOutcome date0..1date
symptomsE. Patient symptoms (from disease onset) and complications0..1group
feverFever (>=38 C) or history of fever0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
chillsChills0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
coughCough0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
soreThroatSore throat0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
runnyNoseRunny nose0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
vomitingVomiting0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
diarrhoeaDiarrhoea0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
headacheHeadache0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
neurologicalSignsNeurological signs0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
specifyNeurologicalSignsSpecify0..1stringEnable When: neurologicalSigns = Yes (YesNoUnknown#Yes)
rashRash0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
conjunctivitisConjunctivitis0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
shortnessOfBreathShortness of breath0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
muscleAchesMuscle aches0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
pneumoniaByChestXRayPneumonia by chest X-ray0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
pneumoniaDateStartedDate Started __/__/____0..1dateEnable When: pneumoniaByChestXRay = Yes (YesNoUnknown#Yes)
acuteRespiratoryDistressSyndromeAcute respiratory distress syndrome0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
aRDSDateStartedDate Started __/__/____0..1dateEnable When: acuteRespiratoryDistressSyndrome = Yes (YesNoUnknown#Yes)
acuteRenalFailureAcute renal failure0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
acuteRenalFailureDateStartedDate Started __/__/____0..1dateEnable When: acuteRenalFailure = Yes (YesNoUnknown#Yes)
cardiacFailureCardiac failure0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
cardiacFailureDateStartedDate Started __/__/____0..1dateEnable When: cardiacFailure = Yes (YesNoUnknown#Yes)
consumptiveCoagulopathyConsumptive coagulopathy0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
otherSymptomsOther symptoms (if yes, specify)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
otherSymptomsSpecifySpecify0..1stringEnable When: otherSymptoms = Yes (YesNoUnknown#Yes)
comorbidityF. Patient pre-existing condition0..1group
cancerCancer0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
diabetesDiabetes0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
hivImmuneDeficiencyHIV/other immune deficiency0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
heartDiseaseHeart disease0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
asthmaAsthma0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
chronicLungDiseaseChronic lung disease (non-asthma)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
chronicLiverDiseaseChronic liver disease0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
chronicHaematologicalDisorderChronic haematological disorder0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
pregnancyPregnancy0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
trimesterIf yes, specify trimester0..1stringValue Set: Yes No Unknown
chronicKidneyDiseaseChronic kidney disease0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
chronicNeurologicalImpairmentChronic neurological impairment0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
obesityObesity0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
otherConditionsOther (if yes, specify)0..1stringValue Set: Yes No Unknown
influenzaVaccinationPatient was vaccinated for influenza in the past 12 months0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
ExposureSection 3: Exposure and travel history0..1group
comorbidityG. Patient occupational exposures0..1group
occupationOccupation (specify location/facility)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
healthcareWorkerHealth-care worker (if yes, specify type/location)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
laboratoryWorkerLaboratory worker (if yes, specify type/location)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
veterinaryWorkerVeterinary worker (if yes, specify animal types handled in the 10 days before illness)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
wildlifeWorkerWildlife worker (if yes, specify animal types handled in the 10 days before illness)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
liveAnimalMarketWorkerLive animal market worker (if yes, specify animal types handled in the 10 days before illness)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
farmWorkerFarm worker (if yes, specify animal types handled in the 10 days before illness)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
humanExposureH. Patient human exposures in the 14 days before illness onset0..1group
visitedOutpatientFacilityPatient visited outpatient treatment facility (if yes, specify)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
visitedTraditionalHealerPatient visited traditional healer (if yes, specify)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
visitedInpatientFacilityPatient visited or was admitted to inpatient health facility (if yes, specify)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
attendedMassGatheringPatient attended festival or mass gathering (if yes, specify)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
exposedToSimilarIllnessPatient exposed to person with similar illness0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
typeOfContactType of contact0..1choiceValue Set: Contact Type
locationOfExposureLocation of exposure0..1choiceValue Set: Exposure Location
uniqueCaseIdUnique case ID of sick person (if available)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
relationshipToPatientRelationship to current patient (specify, e.g. family, friend, health-care worker, colleague)0..1string
bloodLinkedBlood linked (if yes, specify link)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
confirmedProbableCaseSick person confirmed or deemed a probable case in current event0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
travelExposureI. Patient travel history in the 14 days before illness onset (add sheets if multiple locations visited)0..1group
travelledOutsidePatient travelled out of first administrative region0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
travelDetailsspecify location (city or region, country)0..*group
destinationDestination0..1string
transportTypemodel of Travel0..1string
arrivalDateArrival: __/__/__0..1date
departureDateDeparture: __/__/__0..1date
companionPatient travelled with companions (if yes, specify)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
animalExposureJ. Patient animal exposures in the 14 days before illness onset0..1group
patientHandledAnimalsPatient handled animals0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
typesOfAnimalsHandledTypes of animals handled (e.g. pigs, chicken, ducks or others)0..1stringValue Set: Yes No Unknown
natureOfContactNature of contact (e.g. feed, groom or slaughter)0..1stringValue Set: Yes No Unknown
locationOfAnimalContactLocation of animal contact0..1stringValue Set: Animal Contact Location
animalsSickOrDeadWithin 2 weeks before or after contact, any animals sick or dead? (if yes, specify type and number, and proportion from flock or herd)0..1stringValue Set: Yes No Unknown
animalsInEnvironmentPatient exposed to animals in environment but did not handle them (e.g. in neighbourhood, farm, zoo, at home, agricultural fair or work)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
typesOfAnimalsInEnvironmentTypes of animals in that environment (e.g. pigs, chicken, ducks or others)0..1stringValue Set: Yes No Unknown
locationOfExposureToAnimalsLocation of exposure0..1stringValue Set: Animal Exposure Location
animalsInEnvironmentSickOrDeadWithin 2 weeks before or after exposure to animals in the environment, any animals sick or dead? (if yes, specify type and number, and proportion from flock or herd)0..1stringValue Set: Yes No Unknown
animalByProductsExposurePatient exposed to animal by-products (e.g. bird feathers) or animal excreta (if yes, specify product)0..1stringValue Set: Yes No Unknown
visitedLiveAnimalMarketPatient visited live animal market (if yes, specify market)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
foodExposureK. Patient food exposures in the 14 days before illness onset0..1group
rawConsumptionPatient consumed raw or unpasteurized animal products (if yes, specify products)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
rawRemedyConsumptionPatient consumed health or traditional remedies with raw or unpasteurized animal products (if yes, specify products)0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
perceivedExposureL. Patient perceived exposure0..1group
sourceFrom the point of view of the patient or family, what is the likely source of infection and geographic location of exposure?0..1string
LaboratorySection 4: Laboratory Information0..1group
specimensCollectedSpecimens collected from patient (tick as needed)0..1choiceValue Set: Specimen Collected
pathogenTestingDonePathogen testing done (tick as needed)0..1choiceValue Set: Pathogen Tested
specimensShippedSpecimens shipped to international reference laboratories0..1choiceValue Set: Yes No Unknown
shipmentDateshipment date:0..1date
specifySpecimensPositiveSpecify specimen(s) positive0..1string
specifyPathogensPositiveSpecify pathogen(s) positive0..1string
specifyTargetsPositiveSpecify targets positive (e.g. for MERS-CoV)0..1string
specifySubtypePositiveSpecify subtype positive (e.g. for influenza)0..1string
specifyTitresSpecify titres (e.g. paired serum for influenza)0..1string

Documentation for this format

name: Questionnaire-SOTGenericRespiratoryDiseaseCIF
title: Generic Respiratory Disease Case Investigation Form
description: Generic Respiratory Disease Case Investigation Form

item.text: Generic Respiratory Disease Case Investigation Form
B. Interview respondent Information (if not patient)
Date of first health facility visit (including traditional care)
Total health facilities visited till outcome
Date of intensive care unit admission
E. Patient symptoms (from disease onset) and complications
Fever (>=38 C) or history of fever
Patient was vaccinated for influenza in the past 12 months
Veterinary worker (if yes, specify animal types handled in the 10 days before illness)
Wildlife worker (if yes, specify animal types handled in the 10 days before illness)
Live animal market worker (if yes, specify animal types handled in the 10 days before illness)
Farm worker (if yes, specify animal types handled in the 10 days before illness)
H. Patient human exposures in the 14 days before illness onset
Patient visited outpatient treatment facility (if yes, specify)
Patient visited traditional healer (if yes, specify)
Patient visited or was admitted to inpatient health facility (if yes, specify)
Patient attended festival or mass gathering (if yes, specify)
Patient exposed to person with similar illness
Unique case ID of sick person (if available)
Relationship to current patient (specify, e.g. family, friend, health-care worker, colleague)
Sick person confirmed or deemed a probable case in current event
I. Patient travel history in the 14 days before illness onset (add sheets if multiple locations visited)
Patient travelled out of first administrative region
Patient travelled with companions (if yes, specify)
J. Patient animal exposures in the 14 days before illness onset
Types of animals handled (e.g. pigs, chicken, ducks or others)
Nature of contact (e.g. feed, groom or slaughter)
Within 2 weeks before or after contact, any animals sick or dead? (if yes, specify type and number, and proportion from flock or herd)
Patient exposed to animals in environment but did not handle them (e.g. in neighbourhood, farm, zoo, at home, agricultural fair or work)
Types of animals in that environment (e.g. pigs, chicken, ducks or others)
Within 2 weeks before or after exposure to animals in the environment, any animals sick or dead? (if yes, specify type and number, and proportion from flock or herd)
Patient exposed to animal by-products (e.g. bird feathers) or animal excreta (if yes, specify product)
Patient visited live animal market (if yes, specify market)
K. Patient food exposures in the 14 days before illness onset
Patient consumed raw or unpasteurized animal products (if yes, specify products)
Patient consumed health or traditional remedies with raw or unpasteurized animal products (if yes, specify products)
From the point of view of the patient or family, what is the likely source of infection and geographic location of exposure?
Specimens collected from patient (tick as needed)
Specimens shipped to international reference laboratories
Specify titres (e.g. paired serum for influenza)
